    • findLargestChild

      protected E findLargestChild(int parent)
      Find the node that is the inorder predecessor and replace it with its left child (if any). post: The inorder predecessor is removed from the tree.
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent of possible inorder predecessor (ip)
      Returns:
      The data in the ip
